title: The Aura
body:
Everyone lives their lives, most not seeing what lies just beneath the surface. Are you to be just another among the livestock? Or, are do you wish to experience the full realm of possibility? Knowledge is power, yet you have traded the advantage of power for the comfort of ignorance. Ignorance is brazen, yet knowledge is subtle!
	Seek out the fragments of of the subtle arts, so you can fashion the pieces you will need to overcome the results of your rashness.
